mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.order_number , t1.survey_contacts_id , t1.check_time , t1.check_status , t1.examine_stage , t1.owner_id , t1.org_id , t1.create_time , t1.modify_time , t1.create_by , t1.remark from car_loan_cal_phone_log t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update car_loan_cal_phone_log t1 set t1.id =#{dto.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.order_number =#{dto.orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.survey_contacts_id =#{dto.surveyContactsId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.check_time =#{dto.checkTime,jdbcType=DATE}, t1.check_status =#{dto.checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.examine_stage =#{dto.examineStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.owner_id =#{dto.ownerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.org_id =#{dto.orgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.create_time =#{dto.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.modify_time =#{dto.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, t1.create_by =#{dto.createBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.remark =#{dto.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from car_loan_cal_phone_log where id in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update car_loan_cal_phone_log t1 set t1.valid='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
mapper.select: select * from car_loan_cal_phone_log t2 where t2.id = (select max(id) from car_loan_cal_phone_log t1 where t1.SURVEY_CONTACTS_ID = #{loanSurveyContactsId} )
select * from car_loan_cal_phone_log t1 where t1.SURVEY_CONTACTS_ID = #{loanSurveyContactsId} and t1.ORDER_NUMBER = #{orderNuber} order by id asc
